VASSAL.build.module.PlayerRoster.buttonToolTip: Switch sides, become an observer, or allow another player to take your side in this game

VASSAL.preferences.BooleanPreference.desc: Automatically match Service Marker rotation to calendar/map
VASSAL.preferences.BooleanPreference.name: ServiceMarkerAutorotate

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Current turn of the game - updated by moving the Levy/Campaign marker around
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: Turn

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Double the current Christian VP (allows us to track half VP)
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: ChristianVPTimes2

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Computed string value showing the "actual" VP e.g. 1.5
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: ChristianVP

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Double the current Muslim VP (allows us to track half VP)
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: MuslimVPTimes2

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Computed string value showing the "actual" VP e.g. 1.5
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: MuslimVP

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: X location that Player last right-clicked (so we can plop any newly created piece in that exact position)
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: PlopX

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Y location that Player last right-clicked (so we can plop any newly created piece in that exact position)
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: PlopY

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Zones where we display the zone name instead of the location
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: UseZoneName

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Counter for how many command cards we've just "sent" to the deck, used for display
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: CommandCardsSent

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Semaphore to make sure VP marker doesn't receive GKC more than once per time it gets fired off
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: UpdatingVPMarkerSemaphore

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Tells what lord we are currently asking to muster (for Lord Cylinder to tell the Mat Location what Mat to put there)
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: MusterThisLord

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: Semaphore when lord cylinder tells a mat location to muster the lord's mat
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: DidMuster

VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.description: How many total pieces we've ever removed from the game (so that we keep putting removed pieces in a new position each time)
VASSAL.build.module.properties.GlobalPro.name: RemovedPieces

VASSAL.build.module.folder.GlobalPropert.name: Mat Location Tracking Properties (indexed by LordID)

VASSAL.build.module.folder.GlobalPropert.desc: Marks what's currently in each Mat spot -- "" for nothing or else the LordID
VASSAL.build.module.folder.GlobalPropert.name: Mat Spots

VASSAL.build.module.folder.GlobalPropert.desc: (gets set to "Y" when service marker goes to Removed From Play map)
VASSAL.build.module.folder.GlobalPropert.name: Vassals Removed From Play
